reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights and had a different experience of Zurich.
reviews.title: The Country Side of Zurich

reviews.text: It is located in Triemli - a residential district of Zurich. Train journey from Zurich Main Station to Triemli Train Station is about 15 mins BUT there are only 2 train services per hour. The train station is closer to the hotel (less than 5 mins walk) than the tram station but there is almost no directional sign from the station. The Triemli Tram station is about 25 mins walk and not recommended for those on 1st visit to this guest house. There were no directional signs the moment we leave the tram station and we were lost for about 45 minutes before we found a resident of the area who knew the exact location of this guest house.
reviews.title: didn't expected much, but got less

reviews.text: The hotel staff - from the reception to the restaurant, were very helpful and courteous. There was a basket of fresh apples at the reception table - these apples were from the garden behind the hotel (very fresh and sweet). There is a very beautiful autumn view of the mountains from the back of the hotel. The room was average - had a safe box, dim lighting, hair dryer, clean towels, worn out looking carpet.
reviews.title: Great hideout amidst nature

reviews.text: The breakfast spread is well presented and fresh, the plus point is the freshly brewed coffee and the fresh apples! Possibly due to the location, the hotel guests here looked very refreshed and relaxed.
reviews.title: Good value in an expensive city

reviews.text: This hotel has its pros and cons. Not recommended for business travellers. Recommended for travellers who enjoyed a slower pace of life and prefers another sight and feel of Zurich.
reviews.title: Great place if you can find it.

likes.disliked: — Difficulty finding it the the first time

reviews.title: Out of the way, but good quality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was clean but quite spacious.
reviews.title: Easy access

likes.disliked: — Sometimes too hot in the room!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A short walk from train station, but only 1/2 hourly train service. Note the 15 min service on the same line at the main train station does not extend as far as the station next to this hotel. Station is on the same line as Uetliberg. About 15 mins by train to reach the main station.
reviews.title: Good enough for the money

likes.liked: — I liked the pricetag best, and I can imagine that if you have the time to explore, the surroundings are great!
likes.disliked: — The hotel itself is nothing special and it can be difficult to find.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a small three-star hotel with no view and no special amenities, but if you just want to spend a night or two in Zurich, it is perfectly adequate. Parking space for car no problem, for going into Zurich take the S-Bahn located within three minutes walk from the hotel. Rooms small but very clean, breakfast good. Price slightly on the high side in my opinion, but all Zurich hotels are expensive. Would return for a one-night stay.
reviews.title: Perfectly adequate

reviews.text: I went to Zurich for a weekend, and stayed at Atlantis Guesthouse.
reviews.title: Place for improvement

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel is not in the city centre, but there is a train station 400m from the hotel, and a Tram stop at 1km.
reviews.title: Quiet location, best value in Zürich

reviews.text: The rooms weren't that big, 2 separate beds and not much more space.
reviews.title: Great Location , Excellent staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although not the cheapest available in Zurich it is probably the best of the 'budget' options. Set in a quiet suburb of the city, the hotel is well situated for the use of the fantastic public transport. Tickets for which are available from the staff at reception. The breakfast is typical of Europe but has a very extensive range. The rooms are very clean and pretty well equipped. Car parking outside the hotel is free of charge.
reviews.title: Friendly and comfortable hotel.

reviews.text: We had part of an excellent treatment at this hotel. Very clean, good breakfast and the staff was excellent, great help. We booked the hotel through bookinhotels.com and when we arived at the hotel found out that due to non payment from the part of the website, the agency which booked the hotel, canceled the reservations. The receptionist was very nice and explained us the situation and said that the hotel give the clients in this situation, a very good rate, which was only 5 swiss francs higher than the one we paid on the bookinhotels.com. She also offered to check for us if our booking through the same website with another hotel in Montreux was also canceled and provided us with documentation to help us to recoup the money from our credit card. Impressive!
reviews.title: Excellent service, excellent staff specially receptionist Cristina

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were simple but very clean and the breakfast offered variation and staff which served us very nice. I would go there again!
reviews.title: Great location - 5 stops away from the city buzz, amoung plenty nature

reviews.text: We were a bit affraid of the walking distance between the rail stop and the hotel, but it's less than a 5 minute walk. Excelent! Just beware that if your thinking of going out till late, the last train leaves the central station round about 01h00. After that either catch a 30 CHF taxi or wait out until the 05h00 trains.
reviews.title: Great value for money... a comfortable place to stay!
